messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine the Great Pacific Mall with 15 stores. Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, and Sephora are all connected to each other. Pete’s Coffee, Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works are connected to each other. Chickflea, Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, and Nike are all connected to each other. Marshalls, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, and Target are connected to each other. Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works are connected to each other. Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, and Target are connected to each other. Paris Baguette, H&M, and Zara are connected to each other. Nike is connected to Bath and Body Works. Levis, GNC Live Well and Target are connected to each other. H&M is connected to Zara. Sephora is connected to Bath and Body Works. GNC Live Well is connected to Target. What is the shortest path from Starbucks to Pete’s Coffee? Please list the store names in order, separated by commas.

1. Start at Starbucks
2. Go to Paris Baguette
3. Go to H&M
4. Go to Zara
5. Go to Sephora
6. Go to Bath and Body Works
7. Go to Pete's Coffee

Answer: Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, Sephora, Bath and Body Works, Pete's Coffee
